painPoints: Feeling spiritually dead inside despite having a successful life on paper
Therapist says they're fine but they know something deeper is missing
Exhausted in a way that sleep and vacations can't fix (spiritual burnout)
Lost sense of purpose after kids left home, divorce, career change, or retirement
Drawn to spiritual work but afraid of being dismissed as unqualified or woo-woo
Helping friends and family heal for free but no professional framework or income
terminology: Spiritual disconnection - disruption of connection between inner self and sense of meaning, purpose, and peace
S.A.C.R.E.D. Method - See, Attune, Clear, Reconnect, Empower, Deepen framework
5 Root Causes - Unresolved trauma, accumulated grief, chronic burnout, toxic relationships, loss of purpose
Energy clearing - removing stagnant energy from toxic environments and unprocessed experiences
Sacred journaling protocols - structured writing exercises that surface unconscious patterns
Inner child work - reconnecting clients with wounded parts that hold the key to spiritual wholeness
Scope of practice - facilitate spiritual wellness without diagnosing conditions or replacing medical care
clientExamples: Women 40-55 going through major life transitions (divorce, empty nest, career change)
Burned-out professionals who feel spiritually bankrupt despite outward success
People processing grief that therapy alone hasn't resolved
Those in toxic relationships who have lost connection to their intuition and inner guidance
Anyone who describes feeling hollow, lost, or like something fundamental is missing
practiceType: Spiritual wellness coaching focused on meditation, breathwork, energy clearing, journaling, and integrative spiritual practices
